overview.business_description: Automotive sealing systems manufacturer supplying technologically advanced products to global carmakers, focusing on sound, dust, water, and heat insulation. Delivers tailored solutions through engineering expertise in rubber and polymer-based sealing systems.
overview.fatal_flaw: DISTRESSED - Bonds trading at 15 cents; CCC- rating; active restructuring with creditors; PE sponsor Actera ceding control to creditors
overview.recent_news: RESTRUCTURING IN PROGRESS. Mar 2025: Debt talks ongoing as RCF maturity nears. Jan 2025: Ad hoc bondholder group formed (Bluebay, Tresidor, Shiprock). Dec 2024: S&P downgraded to CCC- on high restructuring risk. Jul 2025: Creditors acquiring 100% from Actera.

equity_market_value.note: Distressed - equity likely worthless; creditors taking control

key_deals.deal: PENDING: Creditors acquiring 100% from Actera Group (debt-for-equity)
Ad hoc bondholder group formed; Alcentra exited

credit_opinion.summary: DISTRESSED RESTRUCTURING. Standard Profil bonds trading at 15 cents on the dollar (~1,922% yield). Creditors forming ad hoc group to negotiate debt-for-equity swap, with PE sponsor Actera ceding control. Super senior facilities and bridge loans indicate acute liquidity stress. This is an active workout situation.
credit_opinion.recommendation: DISTRESSED SITUATION - Only for specialist distressed investors
